note:
She/her
Witchy, queer, crafty. Anti-lawn, pro-union. Kitchen witch, ex-barista. Hypermobile and chronic pain sufferer. Love to garden and grow - USA Zone 6a.

Profile picture description: a photo of a red haired woman wearing a cloth mask decorated with roses. My hair is curled and slightly longer than chin length, and I am wearing a pink shirt.

Header description: a photo of a branch of blue chicory flowers. The background is blurred and tan, giving an artsy quality to the image.
